__e: Ali rushes to his wife and says:
I'm not the kind of guy that runs home to mom.
He runs to the family just as the mother did.
After a while, you run the other way.
You will always be the child who runs to her father.
Let's find it so you'll know which way to run.
I mean do you run as fast as you can everywhere all of the time?
We'll go from one lovely bachelor's pad to the next.
Because all I have to do is be the first guy that she runs into.
Half of my blood flowing in my veins, my skin, my hair, my eyes
Are you talking about a piece of paper or the blood that runs through my veins?
My brother took a bullet in his chest are you sure the same blood runs through your veins?
My love for her is far greater than your blood that runs in her veins
If yet your blood does not rage, then it is waterthat flows in your veins.
Come on! I am telling you, when something runs toward you, it's neverfor a nice reason.
Your blood has flowed into my arm and mine into yours.
You run everywhere, or is it just you're scared of me?
Plus, he runs like a girl.
(DOORBELL) Just so you know, he runs like a girl.
I have to say don't rule it out-- it's possible.
You run like a son of a bitch.
(DOORBELL) Just so you know, he runs like a girl.
Of course you can't pass like me, or run like me.
The only thing I can say is that my life's in danger and I can't trust anyone.
Well, as I see it, if he is in danger, someone should tell him about it. And I, uh, believe he is.
What you've said may be true, but our child's in danger. That comes first, it must come first.
Unless he acts...and acts soon, he runs the risk of allowing events to control him.
It's the kind of business you don't run any risk of!
You go in there alone... you risk them killing all three of you.
It's the kind of business you don't run any risk of!
Now I know you run quite a bit all the time.
Why get a car if you run all the time?
Run, run, run. Dog, dog hurry, hurry he's coming leave the sofa, drop it...
We rush and rush, but there's nothing better than just sitting down.
"I'm just no good!" You run and run and run
Make it anything, but get this baby into the air!
We walk running, without seeing the whole escapes us.
That whole sad business of Judeo-Christian jogging. You were not born to run.
